verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees הִנֵּ֤ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> Behold bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> all [ye] servants יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָעֹמְדִ֥ים <S%H5975><s%> stand בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> which by night
שְׂאֽוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up יְדֵכֶ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> your hands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [in] the sanctuary וּ֝בָרֲכוּ <S%H1288><s%> and bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֣ <S%H1288><s%> bless יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> thee out of Zion עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> that made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth
